parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID displayed on the Recursive Resolution (Public DNS) page after you activate Alibaba Cloud Public DNS.

parameters.name: EndTimestamp
parameters.description: The end time of the query (timestamp, unit: milliseconds). ><warning>If the query time span is too large and the amount of resolution logs for the queried domain is excessive, it may lead to a query timeout or inaccurate query results.></warning>

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Return value language, options: 
- zh: Chinese 
- en: English

Default: en

parameters.name: Module
parameters.description:
Module type 
- AUTHORITY (default): Public Authoritative DNS 
- RECURSION: Public Recursive DNS

parameters.name: QueryCondition
parameters.description:
Query parameters 
- sourceIp: Source IP address 
- queryNameFuzzy: Domain name (fuzzy value) 
- queryType: Record type 
- value: Resolution result 
- status: Status 
- serverIp: Resolution server IP

parameters.name: StartTimestamp
parameters.description: The start time of the query (timestamp, unit: milliseconds).
